Laravel Charts

The missing laravel charting library

Get Started →

Simplicity First

Minimal API to create modern and robust charts out of a few lines of PHP code.

Vue-Friendly

Charts works with vue and probably other front-end frameworks due to it's design.

Presets

Get up and running quickly with some presets already built for your favourite charting library.
